dmca.title: [EV1-C1418965W] software piracy on your servers
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: Spider Horn [mailto:spiderhorn2006@yahoo.com] 
Posted At: Monday, October 30, 2006 2:13 AM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: FW: [EV1-C1418965W] software piracy on your servers
Subject: Re: FW: [EV1-C1418965W] software piracy on your servers


cant you JUST GO to http://amstel2003.net/ and log on to his server and
SEE IT YOURSELF what does he host there? if you dont do something about
that, i'll write to MICROSOFT, BSA, FBI and all other companys which
will take law proceedings against YOU because you didnt act on reports
